delete-bloc.title: Account deletion
delete-bloc.content: You can delete your DossierFacile account at any time. This will automatically delete all you documents.

opinion-bloc.title: Tell us about your experience with DossierFacile
opinion-bloc.content: We are constantly looking to improve the quality of our service. As part of this improvement process, we seek your feedback. By clicking on the button below, you will be able to rate DossierFacile. Your feedback is valuable to us! Thank you.

account.share-file-description: Copy your file link to share it! It's up to you to send it to the landlords or property owners of your choice (by email, SMS, etc.)

cotenantname.title: Provide Personal Information of My Co-tenant
cotenantname.subtitle: Please provide the information of the person whose name will appear on the lease agreement.
cotenantname.franceconnect-account: This account is identified with FranceConnect, and the names cannot be edited.

coupleinformationhelp.paragraph1: By providing your co-tenant's email address, they will be invited to contribute to the creation of your joint application. With their own email and password, they will have the ability to log into your joint application and add, modify, or delete any document, both their personal documents and yours.
coupleinformationhelp.paragraph2: Attention! Your personal documents and their personal documents will be processed separately by DossierFacile. You can submit and have them validated independently. However, your joint application will only be validated as a whole once both your documents and their documents have been validated by DossierFacile. You will then have a single shared link for your entire joint application.
coupleinformationhelp.paragraph3: In practice, your co-tenant will receive an invitation by email, which they must validate within 48 hours. They simply need to click the link, set their password, and they will be connected to your joint application.

coupleinformation.acceptAuthor: I agree that my partner will have access to my documents and those of my guarantor, if applicable, once both of our applications have been validated
coupleinformation.partner-email-title: Invite them to fill out their application?
coupleinformation.email-exists:
You cannot associate two accounts with the same email address!
Please provide a different email address.

deleteaccount.title: Account Deletion
deleteaccount.confirm-delete: Please confirm the complete deletion of the account
deleteaccount.try-again: Unable to delete your account. Please try again. If the problem persists, please contact us.

documenthelp.title: Help
documenthelp.paragraph1:
If your document is too large, we recommend scanning it (using a free app for smartphones, for example).
If that doesn't work, contact us by email at contact{'@'}dossierfacile.logement.gouv.fr, and we'll do our best to respond as quickly as possible!

nameinformation.join-title: You're just a few steps away from joining {0}'s rental file!
nameinformation.same-for-guarantors: And the same list for your guarantors!

ownershare.title: Apply for the housing located at {0}
ownershare.subtitle: DossierFacile is a government startup that allows you to create your smart rental file and share it with property owners
ownershare.accept-owner: I accept that {0}, the owner located at {1}, has access to the information in my file and that of my spouse or roommates, if applicable. In accordance with the GDPR, I can revoke this authorization at any time.
ownershare.no-account-1: If you don't have an account, you can create one and come back to this page later.
ownershare.no-account-2: Our file is easy to fill out (less than 3 minutes, promised) and it complies with the law.
ownershare.no-account-3: And reusable for all your other visits!
ownershare.connection-success: Your file has been successfully shared with the owner
ownershare.join-account: As a guest account, you cannot link your file to an owner account. Please ask the account that invited you to do so.

partnerssection.partners-services-section: Do you know the following services?

partnerssection.anil-text: Practical information about your rights and obligations? Your ADIL advises you for free

residency-page.will-delete-files: Attention, changing your situation will delete your supporting documents. You will need to upload the documents corresponding to your new situation again.
residency-page.warning-other-residency: If you are a tenant or you are accommodated free of charge, please select the relevent option, otherwise your file won't be validated.
residency-page.warning-incomplete: Incomplete files (those that do not include these 3 documents) will not be validated.
residency-page.warning-only-rent-receipt: Proof of residence (housing tax, electricity bill, telephone bill, etc.) are not accepted here. Only your receipts (or a certificate of good payment of rents) allow a landlord to ensure that you pay your rents.
residency-page.warning-tax: The tax notice is not an accepted document here.

roommatesinformationhelp.paragraph1: By providing your roommate's email address, they will be able to create their own file with their documents. Your two files will be linked, and your shared file link will be common.
roommatesinformationhelp.paragraph2: Concretely, your roommate will receive an invitation that they will need to validate within 48 hours.
roommatesinformationhelp.paragraph3: In case your roommate couldn't confirm their registration within 48 hours, you will need to start over!

roommatesinformation.acceptAuthor: I accept that other members of my shared housing have access to my documents and those of my guarantor, if applicable, once all the shared files have been validated.
roommatesinformation.acceptAuthor-2: I also agree that the other members of my shared housing can share the documents in my file with landlords, lessors or property services that are partners of DossierFacile.
roommatesinformation.title: Who will be your roommates?
roommatesinformation.email-exists: You cannot associate two accounts with the same email address!
roommatesinformation.email-exists-2: Please provide a different email address.
roommatesinformation.co-tenant-already-exists: An account already exists with this email address. Please enter a different address.
roommatesinformation.more-information: Why is this information useful to us?

sharefile.title: Share your file
sharefile.desc1: Enter the recipient's email address below to share your file. Each recipient receives a unique link that you can disable whenever you wish.
sharefile.desc2: If you do not have the recipient's email address, you can send the link to your file via messaging or SMS, for example.
sharefile.desc3: Reminder: DossierFacile does not offer housing.
sharefile.sent-success: Your file has been sent by mail
sharefile.sent-failed: Email sharing failed. Please try again.

view.title: See your file
view.text: See your DossierFacile before to share it ?

signuppage.mail-sent: An email has been sent to the provided address.

tenantpanel.congratulations-text-1: To apply for your dream accommodation, share your application with a landlord of your choice, with or without supporting documents. You can do this by email, by providing their email address in the "Share My Application" section below, or by sending your DossierFacile link via email, SMS, etc. to the landlords or property owners of your choice.
tenantpanel.congratulations-text-2: Please note that DossierFacile does not provide accommodation.

validatefile.title: I Validate My File
validatefile.read-no-guarantor: I read and check the following box to validate my file
validatefile.declaration: I declare that I am aware of Article 441-1 of the Penal Code, which penalizes forgery and the use of forgery with three years of imprisonment and a fine of 45,000 euros.
validatefile.precision: If I wish, I can provide specific important information about my situation to my future landlords. My text will be added at the beginning of my file:
validatefile.read: I read and check the following boxes to validate my file
validatefile.declaration2: I declare that I have obtained the consent of the individuals (spouse, roommates, or guarantors) to use their personal documents and associate them with my file.
validatefile.declaration2-plural: I solemnly declare that I have obtained the consent of my guarantors for their data to be processed within the rental process.
validatefile.validation-error-description: Limit modifications and make sure to validate your file today.

file-not-ready.explanation: As soon as it is validated, you will be able to share it and to manage the shared files below.

shared-links.resend-too-many: Cannot resend invitation link: a previous link was generated less than an hour ago. Please try again later.
shared-links.enable-failed: Unable to enable sharing of this file. Please try again.
shared-links.disable-failed: Unable to disable sharing of this file. Please try again.

404.title: Page not found
404.subtitle: Error 404
404.caption: This is not the web page you are lookingfor.

content.line1: If you typed the web address in the browser, make sure it is correct. The page may no longer be available.
content.line2: In this case, to continue your visit, you can check out our homepage.
content.line3: Otherwise, contact us so that we can redirect you to the right information.
